TopicTitle: That mod that adds fires and damage control

Articles.Content:
There was a mod I saw a while ago that made fires a threat to spacecraft. That is, parts could catch fire upon taking damage, and the player had to activate the fire suppression system to prevent it from spreading. If they didn't catch it in time, it would spread to other parts, gradually overheating them. I want to find this mod, but I can't remember the name. Can someone help?
